info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:49PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Broome, southeastern Tioga, south central Chenango, northwestern Susquehanna and northern Bradford Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chenango Forks to near Springfield. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Kirkwood, Sayre, Conklin, Maine, Owego and Athens. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 6. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 62 and 78. Interstate 88 between 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
